issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
1.Run Kitchensink on BB simulator or device
2.Tap on controls tab or any tab
3.Tap on slider -> basic or any other list view

Actual results:
1.The kitchensink window for the tests are shifted to the left & hides half the window

Expected results:
1.The kitchensink window for the tests should not be shifted to the left
fields.summary: BlackBerry: Windows in kitchensink appears to be shifted to the left,hiding half of the window
fields.environment:
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.201301231719
BB simulator : 10.0.9.386
BB sdk built: made it myself on 1/29/13

comments.body:
Verified the fix on the KS given by pedro & the one given by russ & the windows appear normal.
Thus closing the bug

Environment:
Ti Studio : 3.1.0.201302061750
Ti BB SDK : 3.1.0.v20130206165546
Mac OSX : 10.8.2
win 7 64 bit
Win 8
